title: Claude Code Mastery: From Beginner to Orchestrator
title_cs: Mistrovství v Claude Code: Od začátečníka k orchestrátorovi
description: Learn Claude Code from absolute basics (installation, WSL, terminal) to advanced agentic workflows. Master the PSB system, 10 rules for better output, MCP servers, hooks, and sub-agents.
description_cs: Naučte se Claude Code od úplných základů (instalace, WSL, terminál) až po pokročilá agentní workflow. Ovládněte systém PSB, 10 pravidel pro lepší výstupy, MCP servery, hooks a sub-agenty.
learning_objectives: Set up development environment including WSL on Windows and terminal basics
Install and configure Claude Code CLI with Anthropic API key
Complete your first project using the prompt → review → approve cycle
Apply the PSB (Plan, Setup, Build) system for structured AI development
Create and configure CLAUDE.md project constitution files
Use the 10 rules for better AI output quality
Master Plan Mode for complex multi-file implementations
Set up MCP servers for external tool integration (GitHub, databases)
